titles.title: To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to Special Forces Command Sergeant Major Ramon Rodriguez of the Army for acts of valor during the Vietnam War.
To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to Special Forces Command Sergeant Major Ramon Rodriguez of the Army for acts of valor during the Vietnam War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the President to award the Medal of Honor to Command Sergeant Major Ramon Rodriguez for acts of valor during his service in the Army during the Vietnam War.
